By the way, a couple people have brought up the spaceships that I 
evolved =
and how they inspired the concepts that led to CPPNs and 
HypnerNEAT, which=
 is true.

But I also wanted to mention, for the record, that the program t=
hat I 
used to do that was Mattias Fagerlund's DelphiNEAT Genetic Art 
prog=
ram.  

So I really appreciate Mattias having the idea to create that progr=
am! 
Even before the spaceships, I knew I could learn a lot by playing with=
 
it.  In addition to a cool genetic art app, it's a great educational 
uti=
lity and put together very well.
